uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

udp_port.description: The UDP Port Number used for Authentication.

round_trip_time_in_seconds.description: The Round Trip Time Taken by the RADIUS Server for Authentication.

pending_requests.description: Number of Authentication Request packets pending on the RADIUS Server.

retransmitted_requests.description: Number of Authentication Request packets retransmitted to the RADIUS Server.

timeouts.description: Number of Authentication timeouts to the RADIUS Server.

malformed_responses.description: Number of malformed Authentication Response packets received from the RADIUS Server.

bad_authenticators.description: Number of Authentication Response packets received with invalid authenticators from the RADIUS Server.

unknown_types.description: Number of Authentication packets received with unknown type from the RADIUS Server.

packets_dropped.description: Number of Authentication packets dropped from the RADIUS Server.

total_access_requests.description: Number of Authentication Access Request packets sent to the RADIUS Server.

total_access_challenges.description: Number of Authentication Access Challenge packets received from the RADIUS Server.

total_access_accepts.description: Number of Authentication Access Accept packets received from the RADIUS Server.

total_access_rejects.description: Number of Authentication Access Reject packets received from the RADIUS Server.
